alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued April 29 at 6:59AM EDT until April 29 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EDT /9 AM CDT/ THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING TO 2 PM EDT /1 PM CDT/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility less than one quarter mile in dense fog. For the Wind Advisory, west winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...South Walton, Coastal Bay and Coastal Gulf Counties. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 10 AM EDT /9 AM CDT/ this morning. For the Wind Advisory, from 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ this evening to 2 PM EDT /1 PM CDT/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained winds of 26 to 39 mph are expected for at least 2 hours, or gusts between 40 to 57 mph for any length of time are possible.Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; South Walton
